Advertisements Golf Galaxy Customer Service Overview The aggregated data is based on calls made from PissedConsumer.com website and questionnaires provided by PissedConsumer.com users. More commonly used way of contact is by email . Source Distribution 41% phone 59% email The best email to contact Golf Galaxy is customerservice@golfgalaxy.com . 58% of customers use this email address to address their issues and concerns. The best phone number to call Golf Galaxy is 8002879060 . The longest wait times are on Wednesday , while the shortest are on Sunday . View full overview › Golf Galaxy Overview The aggregated data is based on calls made from PissedConsumer.com website and questionnaires provided by PissedConsumer.com users. More commonly used way of contact is by email . Source Distribution 41% phone 59% email The best email to contact Golf Galaxy is customerservice@golfgalaxy.com . 58% of customers use this email address to address their issues and concerns. The best phone number to call Golf Galaxy is 8002879060 . The longest wait times are on Wednesday , while the shortest are on Sunday . People call Golf Galaxy mainly because of cards, request for information, shipping and delivery . 22% of the consumers who called the company’s customer support stated that their issues were resolved. Close Contact Information Golf Galaxy Website: www.golfgalaxy.com Golf Galaxy Help Center: Visit contact page Corporate Office Address: Golf Galaxy 345 Court Street Coraopolis, Pennsylvania 15108 United States Help in Social Networks: Facebook Pinterest Instagram Twitter Linkedin Youtube Golf Galaxy Rating Based on 37 Reviews Rating details 2.0 more details Customer service Product or Service Quality Value for money Advertised vs Delivered Rating Details Customer service Product or Service Quality Value for money Advertised vs Delivered Exchange, Refund and Cancellation Policy Additional Fees Delivery Service Price Affordability Warranty Website Diversity of Products or Services Discounts and Special Offers Close All 49 Golf Galaxy reviews Rating stats Rating trend Summary of Golf Galaxy Customer Service Calls 34 TOTAL CALLS 00:00 AVG CALL DURATION 22% ISSUES RESOLVED Top Reasons of Customers Calls Consumers Call the Most From Why Do People Call Golf Galaxy? Shipping and Delivery Question: 8M ago “Did not receive gift card” 1Y ago “I made a purchase online for the set of the give away club paid $8.99 and didn't get a conformation, is this real oor not” 1Y ago “Received the wrong item and was supposed to get a return label to send back these 2 left shoes” Cards Question: 8M ago “Gift card” 3Y ago “Lost email for gift card” 4Y ago “Fraudulent purchase with my credit card on your website” Request for Information Question: 2Y ago “Verification” 4Y ago “Talk about a refund” 4Y ago “Wondering about a purchase” Staff Question: 4M ago “Lack of customer service” 4Y ago “Poor customer service” Product/ Service Question: 2Y ago “Broken item” 4Y ago “Purchase” 5Y ago “Broken golf club” Activation/ Cancellation Question: 9M ago “I have placed 2 different orders and both have been canceled. Not sure why” 4Y ago “U canceled my order, why,” Payments and Charges Question: 4Y ago “Use coupon code” 4Y ago “Missing coupon” Refund Question: 1Y ago “I want to ask refund last remaining 150.00” Account Question: 2Y ago “Rewards” Return/ Replace Question: 2Y ago “Need to make a return” Other Question: 4M ago “Servise” 1Y ago “Can't reach store” 5Y ago “Order golf balls” About Related Companies Dicks Sporting Goods , GameChanger , Top Flite Golf , Sports Authority , Field And Stream Summary Golf Galaxy is a retail company specializing in golf supplies and accessories. The firm’s history dates back in 1997 when Golf Galaxy opened the doors of its very first store. Nowadays, Golf Galaxy is an industry leader offering a broad selection of apparel, equipment, accessories, technology as well as gifts for players. The company has a large collection of golf brands showcasing such world’s leading labels as TaylorMade, Callaway Golf, PING, Cleveland, and FootJoy among others. Golf Galaxy has variety of discounts and deals offering free shipping for orders starting from $99. Golf Galaxy is ranked 158 out of 2718 in Sport Equipment and Accessories category Area Served USA Payment Methods Compare Golf Galaxy Customer Service To Companies are selected automatically by the algorithm. A company's rating is calculated using a mathematical algorithm that evaluates the information in your profile. The algorithm parameters are: user's rating, number of resolved issues, number of company's responses etc. The algorithm is subject to change in future. Ochoa 61 30710 Los Alcázares, Murcia Mon-Fri: 10-18, Sat-Sun: 10-16 Campoamor Store Unit 2. Ramón de Campoamor 03189 Orihuela Costa, Alicante Mon-Fri: 10-18, Sat-Sun: 10-16 About Galaxy Golf We offer a huge selection of golf clubs, equipment and apparel from the world's leading brands at competitive prices, all in one convenient place. Why Shop With Us? We're on a mission to bring golf enthusiasts across the globe easy access to the latest golf equipment, complimented with a free custom fitting service by one of our PGA experts. We take pride on not only carrying a large selection of officially licensed products from the top major brands, but also industry leading customer service, shipping and return policies. Unmatched Customer Service We are committed to your satisfaction and view each time you contact us as a chance to build a relationship so that we are able to provide an unmatched customer service. We are dedicated to delivering our customers the kind of shopping experience we would want to have. If your expectations are not exceeded, then we haven't done our job! Spine-Chilling Innovation Galaxy Golf is changing the way golf enthusiasts purchase their favourite golf equipment through an innovative, tech-infused approach to selling in today’s on-demand culture. Powering multi-channel commerce for the world’s biggest golf brands, Galaxy Golf offers the largest collection of golf equipment whether shopping online, on your phone, or in our stores. Shop With Confidence Protecting your privacy is of the utmost importance to us. We use state-of-the-art encryption technology (SSL) to protect your credit card/personal information. Your information is 100% safe when you shop with us. We may email you to alert you of special sales or new arrivals, but you are free to opt-out of these messages with just one click. Need more info? Click here to view our privacy policy . Seriously Competitive Prices Authorised Dealer Unmatched Customer Service Next-Day Shipping Trusted Retailer SIGN UP AND SAVE Recently Viewed Products Got questions? Call us! (+34) 868 171 981 (+34) 966 775 856 Visit Our Stores Mar Menor Superstore Calle Severo Ochoa 61, 30710 Los Alcázares, Murcia Mon-Fri: 10am-6pm, Sat: 10am-4pm Campoamor Store Unit 2, Calle Ramon de Campoamor, 03189 Orihuela Costa, Alicante Mon-Fri: 10am-6pm, Sat: 10am-4pm Information About Us Galaxy Green Fees Mar Menor Store Campoamor Store Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions Customer Area FAQs Contact Us My Account Shipping & Returns Track Your Order © 2025 Galaxy Golf. You can use the online contact form below, where your message will be dealt with as appropriate, or alternatively contact us on the telephone numbers below. Honorary Secretary , Peter Mahoney: Tel: 01702 526 911 You may complete this form to send an email directly to Belfairs Golf Club. Alternatively, you can send an email to the following email address: info@belfairsgolfclub.co.uk . Contact Form Name Email Phone Subject **Please select an option** Clubhouse General Membership Members Website Account Request a Handicap Certificate Visitor Message Please do not provide anything sensitive here, like health details, or your credit card number. Accept Decline Our History Our Golf Garage was founded back in 2020 by two college students and golf enthusiasts. Our online store offers a wide selection of used golf equipment including clubs, bags, balls, and regripping services. We believe our prices are extremely competitive, whether you are looking to upgrade an existing set, trade in your clubs, or are a beginner looking for a place to start. We buy used clubs and offer quick shipping to 48 states across the U.S. Contact us if you have any questions or want to know more details! With the goal to make golf accessible to all by providing cost-effective, previously owned clubs and sets, balls, and bags!
